name: The Oxygen Thief
description:
An entry to the GameDevNetwork: Gooseberry Jam!

Explore a randomly generated landscape of despair.. with online highscores.

  

Alone, on an alien planet, you have lost your ship and the air is thin. Your only choice is to pillage the local village and steal from the innocent. Weave your cruel narrative across the land.

  

Controls: 

[W, A, S, D] Move

[E] Steal Oxygen Tank

[Esc] Quit

Programmer: https://twitter.com/andrewhowizon

Artist: https://www.artstation.com/katisalminen

Music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDEMKjKoQrYkR_H7wP4iVxA

GameDevNetwork: https://discord.gg/gdn
